Title__c: IFS Credit Controls
BMCServiceDesk__shortDescription__c:

BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
Hello,

I have noticed several accounts that the credit controls do not seem to be working. Here is an account 400600 that is set with a limit of 100k, 25K past due and 30 days allowance. So, if an order fails any one of these parameters, then the order should be blocked. Oldest order on the account was due 1-4-24 so anything 2-3-24 and after should be blocked. I have 6 orders so far that have been shipped and billed that should have been blocked. Looking through the order history and the orders were never unblocked by anyone, so I am not sure why they were allowed to go through. I have looked at the terms which you can set to ignore credit controls and double checked the credit control group and do not understand why the orders were not blocked.

Will you please investigate this issue and let me know. If you need more examples, I will find them as it has happened on numerous occasions and numerous accounts.

Any questions, let me know.

[cid:image004.png@01DA79E2.26910920]

[cid:image006.png@01DA79E2.9C430A60]

[cid:image007.png@01DA79E2.9C430A60]

[cid:image001.png@01DA79E1.C238B630]

[cid:image005.png@01DA79E2.26910920]

[cid:image002.png@01DA79E1.C238B630]

[cid:image008.png@01DA79E2.B2EDCE30]

Regards,

Ben Hamblin
Credit Manager
Diamond Vogel
PO Box 380
Orange City, IA 51041
P: 712-707-9723
F: 712-737-4998
W: diamondvogel.com

[dv_email]

records.BMCServiceDesk__description__c: Client Note
Notes
records.BMCServiceDesk__note__c: I feel like I understand how he controls are supposed to work so then why with my attached example did the orders NOT get blocked when the only parameter exceeded was the number of days past due?

records.BMCServiceDesk__description__c: Email Sent-Incident #00014429 -  IFS Credit Controls  (Ref:IN:00014429)
records.BMCServiceDesk__note__c:
From: incident@hoist.tech
Sent: Mon, Apr 15, 2024 16:18 PM
To: integrations@hoist.tech;
Subject: Incident #00014429 -  IFS Credit Controls  (Ref:IN:00014429)


******************************
Attachments sent with this email(1):
	1. Explanation- credit block issue.docx
******************************

Hi Ben,

Hope you are doing well.

I have provided an explanation for the reported issue based on the information available as of April 15th, 2024.

We assume that, according to the previous setup in the credit information, it has not exceeded the $25,000 limit, which falls within the aging buckets.

However, upon further analysis of credit block behavior in Diamond Vogel environments, we have observed that customization has been involved. We suspect that it overrides the credit limit without triggering a credit block.

If the functional specification is available to you, could you please share it with us?
That will help us to define how the system behaves based on the customization, apart from the standard functionality.

kindly review the attached document for more information.

Regards,
​​​​​​​Ashni.

records.BMCServiceDesk__description__c: Notes
records.BMCServiceDesk__note__c: The CRIM field CREDIT LIMIT OVERIDE ALLOWED has no functionality in IFS. That field is only used with our interface to our current point of sale position.      Again, the issue I am seeing with the attached example for Harvest International is that the ALLOWED OVERDUE DAYS is not functioning. Harvest International is below their credit limit and Below ALLOWED OVERDUE AMOUNT but well beyond 30 days past due invoices. Refer to attachment INC-41270_(IFS_Credit_Control)_-_HOIST_4.1.24. This customer has invoices 60 to 90 days past due.      The functionality we are having trouble is that the customer is over ALLOWED OVERDUE DAYS and orders are not blocked. I assume this feature works independently from the other credit block features.

records.BMCServiceDesk__description__c: Email Sent-Incident #00014429 -  IFS Credit Controls  (Ref:IN:00014429)
records.BMCServiceDesk__note__c:
From: incident@hoist.tech
Sent: Mon, Apr 15, 2024 18:26 PM
To: integrations@hoist.tech;
Subject: Incident #00014429 -  IFS Credit Controls  (Ref:IN:00014429)


******************************
Attachments sent with this email(1):
	1. screenshots-DV.docx
******************************

Hi Ben,
​​​​​​​
Thank you for providing information on the CRIM.


Let me further explain, the allowed overdue amount is calculated based on the allowed overdue days.

Allowed overdue days are set to identify the number of overdue days that are allowed for the customer. For example, if you specify 30 days, it will consider the total of unpaid invoices that have exceeded the due date by 30 days as the overdue amount.

Furthermore, in the system, these two parameters work together; hence, it is not allowed to set the allowed overdue amount without setting the allowed overdue days.

kindly check the attached screenshots.






Regards,
Ashni.

Ashni.

Description:

Intent is to identify:
1)	How many incidents were resolved by “workarounds”
2)	If workaround in place, what was the end state required/desired?
a.	IFS bug fix implies a legitimate workaround is in place
b.	CRIM implies that the workaround provided is actually the correct resolution as it is based on the implemented IFS solution
3)	If the end state is an IFS bug fix, has that bug been fixed? Is the workaround still in place?
4)	Did we provide any workaround documentations?

Edgar Estephan

BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
arjen.hoefkens@hoist.tech

New incident - IFS issue

Hi,

As a PM for the Fugro program I am able to approve reported hours on the project ID for cost accounting purposes.
I can do this for all project team members by selecting the appropriate lines and click on the Approval button.
Veronique De Buck has put in her time this morning and I wanted to approve them, however the Approval button does not show up ..!
For Merten DeSmet similar. Both team members are working in another company, using an MCPR project to report their hours.
See first screenshot below: in the menu options no Approval button
When I select a line for my own reported hours, the button does show up, see second screenshot below.

So I was able to approve reported hours for Veronique De Buck before and since today not anymore
Can you please support me in solving this issue?

[Handgemaakte tekening]

[Handgemaakte tekening]

Best regards,
Arjen

Hi,

As a PM for the Fugro program I am able to approve reported hours on the project ID for cost accounting purposes.
I can do this for all project team members by selecting the appropriate lines and click on the Approval button.
Veronique De Buck has put in her time this morning and I wanted to approve them, however the Approval button does not show up ..!
For Merten DeSmet similar. Both team members are working in another company, using an MCPR project to report their hours.
See first screenshot below: in the menu options no Approval button
When I select a line for my own reported hours, the button does show up, see second screenshot below.

So I was able to approve reported hours for Veronique De Buck before and since today not anymore
Can you please support me in solving this issue?

[Handgemaakte tekening]

[Handgemaakte tekening]

Best regards,
Arjen

Subject: New incident - IFS issue (Ref:IN:00014438)

******************************

1. image008.png
2. image009.png
******************************


Hi,

 

As a PM for the Fugro program I am able to approve reported hours on the project ID for cost accounting purposes.

I can do this for all project team members by selecting the appropriate lines and click on the Approval button.

Veronique De Buck has put in her time this morning and I wanted to approve them, however the Approval button does not show up ..!

For Merten DeSmet similar. Both team members are working in another company, using an MCPR project to report their hours.

See first screenshot below: in the menu options no Approval button

When I select a line for my own reported hours, the button does show up, see second screenshot below.

 

So I was able to approve reported hours for Veronique De Buck before and since today not anymore

Can you please support me in solving this issue?

 

 

 

Best regards,

Arjen

Hi Dayadra

I think you mis understood my request. My request is to alert us when message queues start to build up, I do not want us to do anything with the messages. This should just trigger an email to a distribution group to notify them that the message queues are building up and there may be an issue.

The aim is to try and flag these issues before they become user impacting.

Thanks

Julie

Julie Kerwick 10:10 AM IST

Hi Dayadra

I think you mis understood my request. My request is to alert us when message queues start to build up, I do not want us to do anything with the messages. This should just trigger an email to a distribution group to notify them that the message queues are building up and there may be an issue.

The aim is to try and flag these issues before they become user impacting.

Thanks

Julie

Title__c: Quick report Brings different results each time is ran
BMCServiceDesk__shortDescription__c:
Hi I have a quick report that comes from the view in IFS DB: MPCCOM_ACCOUNTING_CFV. 
When the report is run, it gives different results. For testing purposes, we ran it within a 10 min span and the results are different. 
Just trying to understand why,
BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
Hi I have a quick report that comes from the view in IFS DB: MPCCOM_ACCOUNTING_CFV. 
When the report is run, it gives different results. For testing purposes, we ran it within a 10 min span and the results are different. 
Just trying to understand why, if the logic for the report is the same, why different results every time is ran. 
The report name is MRO Spent Accounts.

Title__c: Crystal Report cannot be printed in shipment
BMCServiceDesk__shortDescription__c:
Hello Support. 
a Crystal Report cannot be printed in shipment when the part number 3262794 or WMS0104 is in shipment lines, any other part is working well.
Error: "No PDF report returned from Crystal Web Service"

How to replicate the error:
1 Scree
BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
Hello Support. 
a Crystal Report cannot be printed in shipment when the part number 3262794 or WMS0104 is in shipment lines, any other part is working well.
Error: "No PDF report returned from Crystal Web Service"

How to replicate the error:
1 Screen Shipment search 
Shipment id: 46840 
header RMB select Print packing list 
layout select: ACS Packing List Automotive (Dynamic A4/Letter)
Preview
Error

happens only with a few parts, 
if need more shipments to test then search with this query: 

select * from SHIPMENT_LINE where source_part_no = '3262794'

notes: Test is recently cloned from PROD, please work in TEST environment first. 
Thanks!!

Title__c: CRIM C0002-2 REV 2:  Update to Bill of Lading_GT
BMCServiceDesk__shortDescription__c:
C0002-2 REV 2:  Update to Bill of Lading_GT

Diamond Vogel Germantown would like some changes made to the Developed Bill of Lading format Bill of Lading_GT.  The changes discussed are, have the BOL lines separated out by Customer PO Number, which will b
BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
C0002-2 REV 2:  Update to Bill of Lading_GT

Diamond Vogel Germantown would like some changes made to the Developed Bill of Lading format Bill of Lading_GT.  The changes discussed are, have the BOL lines separated out by Customer PO Number, which will be a new field on the line.  Containers to match the Quantity Shipped (They are shipping Cases), Type updated to the Unit of Measure on the Shipment (most of the time they are shipping in Case Qty), and the total Containers to tally the Container Count (Qty of Cases in the shipment).

Title__c: CONFIGURATION FOR THE MRS FROM THE INTERNAL DESTINATION: 123 TIMEKEEPER
BMCServiceDesk__shortDescription__c: we have a configuration in CFG for the Material Requisition with a condition, when you choose the Internal Destination: 123 Time Keeper and the part requested is an uniform part, this combination  make that the Material requisition doesn't require an aut
BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
we have a configuration in CFG for the Material Requisition with a condition, when you choose the Internal Destination: 123 Time Keeper and the part requested is an uniform part, this combination  make that the Material requisition doesn't require an authorization, we did it this way intentionally because we need that all deliveries from this warehouse be in real time.

You can see the examples: MR 361 and 363, when the MR only has part of uniform, approval is not required.

We need that this configuration can be migrated to Production but we want to know if we can add something else to this configuration, when the Internal Destination is 123 Time Keeper and an uniform part are chosen, can this combination make that the requisitioner only be able to see the timeKeeper Warehouse (TSS)  for the reserve?

In the current configuration in CFG when we choose an uniform part, it allows us to view any warehouse that has this part in inventory.

We are excited to announce that starting April 2024, we will be upgrading to a new ticket management system. This change is aimed at improving our service delivery and ensuring smoother communication with you.

Our new ticket management system will be accessible at the following URL: https://assyst.hoist.tech/assystnet



While we anticipate a seamless transition, there might be minor disruptions during the migration process. We assure you that our team will be on hand to address any issues promptly.

Thank you for your understanding and continued support as we strive to enhance your experience with us.



Best regards,

The Hoist Team



------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sander

Title__c: Supplier price approval process
BMCServiceDesk__shortDescription__c:
Hello support. 
I’m looking to have a process in IFS for Part Price Approvals. The idea is whenever a Buyer from our company negotiates a new price with a Supplier, that new price needs to be approved by their manager. We have an example template below f
BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
Hello support. 
I’m looking to have a process in IFS for Part Price Approvals. The idea is whenever a Buyer from our company negotiates a new price with a Supplier, that new price needs to be approved by their manager. We have an example template below for outside of IFS.

Example: see attached image

Someone on IFS Community recommended we do this:
→ supplier for purchase part set as Inactive immediately after creation → by custom event + approval template created and linked to supplier for purchase part
→ then have another event that would check whenever someone tries to set the sfpp as Active if the approval is 100% completed. Allow part activation only when approval is 100%.

please let us know your thoughts.
Thank you.

Title__c: PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG4 not working
BMCServiceDesk__shortDescription__c: The initial issue was that PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG3 does not process departments (CODENO_B, CODENO_C and a few project related fields) as a solution 2 new jobs were provided to us a few month back, PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG4 and PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG5. PURCHAS
BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
The initial issue was that PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG3 does not process departments (CODENO_B, CODENO_C and a few project related fields) as a solution 2 new jobs were provided to us a few month back, PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG4 and PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG5. PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG5 never worked, so we let that go, however using PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG4 we were able to load the no part lines with departments.
Now the same job does not process any lines even though I follow the advise of the consultant. Since it was working when Edmunston went live it is not acceptable that it does not work now and we need to provide a solution for this.
Please revisit PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG4 in PREPROD environment I was testing with DN42097 and LT315130.

Hi Eszter,

Please note that we have fixed the PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG4 migration job in PreProd. Kindly follow the steps to load the data.
Load the data to PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_IMP.
Run the PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG3 to load the Part/NoPart data to the system.

Run the PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG4 to set the department code / other code_no's.

I had a discussion with Sander on this. Could you check and let us know whether the job works fine?

Best Regards,
​​​​​​​Aasif Iqbal

Hi Eszter,

Please note that we have fixed the PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG4 migration job in PreProd. Kindly follow the steps to load the data.
  1. Load the data to PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_IMP.
  2. Run the PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG3 to load the Part/NoPart data to the system.
  3. Run the PURCHASE_ORD_LINE_MIG4 to set the department code / other code_no's.
I had a discussion with Sander on this. Could you check and let us know whether the job works fine?

Best Regards,
Aasif Iqbal

BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c: Unable to Create Credit Invoice for CD Invoice 100000063966 for WestJet C5068070,Lines 4-3 for qty.9 PN 8Z10357-107:71867 and 5-3  for qty.9 PN 8Z10357-108:71867.  Both lines were supposed to be created as Free of Charge and invoiced at $0.00, but were created as chargeable in error.  Many attempts have been made to 'Create Credit Invoice' from Customer Invoice CD 100000063966, but no Credit Invoice has been created.  Please advise if there is an issue preventing the creation of the Credit Invoice against Customer Invoice CD 100000063966.  Thank you.

Ghazali

Regards,
Luis Cadavid Urieta

records.BMCServiceDesk__description__c: Notes
records.BMCServiceDesk__note__c: Hi Luis, thank you for letting me know.  Yes, I am available tomorrow from 7am Toronto time so any time after that would be great.  Thank you!

records.BMCServiceDesk__description__c: Notes

Ghazali

records.BMCServiceDesk__description__c: Notes
records.BMCServiceDesk__note__c:
Hi Ghazali, were you able to determine how to resolve the issue with not being able to Create Credit Invoice for CD Invoice 100000063966 for WestJet C5068070 Lines 4-3 and 5-3.  Any additional information determined regarding the background jobs errors:       Arguments: REF_INVOICE_ID274611USE_REF_INV_CURR_RATE0INVOICE_CATEGORYCREDITALLOW_CREDIT_INV_FEE
Warning Text: ORA-20110: ProjectConnectionUtil.ACTNOTALLOWED: Activity 100134374 is in Closed status. It is only possible to connect/disconnect project activities in Planned or Released status.  Please let us know.  thank you, Teresa

records.BMCServiceDesk__description__c: Notes
records.BMCServiceDesk__note__c: Hi Ghazali, This issue has now been resolved.  the Project coordinator was able to reopen Activity 100134374 is in Closed status which allowed me to create the Preliminary Credit Invoice 309139.  This Incident can now be closed.  Thank you. Teresa

records.BMCServiceDesk__description__c: Notes

Hi  @Teresa Sawicki

My apologies on the delay,  I was about provide the same solution with a instruction document as I was unavailable today for a call.

However, I am glad that it is fixed now.

DO let me know if you need anything else, and have a Great weekend.

Cheers!
Ghazali

BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c: Hello,     We are experiencing HTTP response 504 when attempting to create a Lobby Element of type Power BI. To reproduce, navigate to the Lobby Element Designer page, click the plus sign to add a new element, and pick Power BI from the dropdown:       The page comes back with this error:       Url (parameters included) = https://diamondvogel-cfg.ifs.cloud/main/ifsapplications/web/elementdesigner;path=0.1656053651.1188772997.671078522.1492810231     Error stack:  Http failure response for https://diamondvogel-cfg.ifs.cloud/pbi/pbi-api/v2/getembeditems: 504 Gateway Timeout        I was hoping you could help me find the cause of this error. The objective is to be able to create a Power BI element for a lobby; any help with that would be appreciated.

BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
1. Our company is taking pictures of MRO parts and uploading in Media item screen in IFS.
2. Every picture taken, has the identity as same as the part number id, existing in IFS.
3. The uploaded pics in IFS are manually linked in the Inventory part Screen.

Please notify and do the following to avaldez@acsind.com 
Antonio Valdez 
Thank you very much.
Regards.

Title__c: Quick Report
BMCServiceDesk__shortDescription__c:
Need a report for unpaid, partially paid, credit customer invoices for operational projects with "completed" status
SELECT 
    PROJECT_CFV.PROJECT_ID, 
    INVOICE_LEDGER_ITEM_CFV.CODE_F, 
    INVOICE_LEDGER_ITEM_CFV.STATE, 
    INVOICE_LEDGER_ITEM_
BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
Need a report for unpaid, partially paid, credit customer invoices for operational projects with "completed" status
SELECT 
    PROJECT_CFV.PROJECT_ID, 
    INVOICE_LEDGER_ITEM_CFV.CODE_F, 
    INVOICE_LEDGER_ITEM_CFV.STATE, 
    INVOICE_LEDGER_ITEM_CFV.IDENTITY, 
    INVOICE_LEDGER_ITEM_CFV.FULL_CURR_AMOUNT, 
    INVOICE_LEDGER_ITEM_CFV.LEDGER_ITEM_ID, 
    PROJECT_CFV.STATE
FROM 
&AO.PROJECT_CFV
INNER JOIN 
&AO.INVOICE_LEDGER_ITEM_CFV 
ON  
    PROJECT_CFV.PROJECT_ID = INVOICE_LEDGER_ITEM_CFV.CODE_F 
WHERE 
    INVOICE_LEDGER_ITEM_CFV.CODE_F LIKE '%'  
    AND (INVOICE_LEDGER_ITEM_CFV.OBJSTATE = 'PartlyPaid' OR INVOICE_LEDGER_ITEM_CFV.OBJSTATE = 'Unpaid')  
    AND PROJECT_CFV.OBJSTATE = 'Completed'

records.BMCServiceDesk__note__c:
From: incident@hoist.tech
Sent: Thu, Apr 18, 2024 14:22 PM
To: integrations@hoist.tech;
Subject: Incident #00014678 -  Max Days Early/Max Days Late Adjustment  (Ref:IN:00014678)

Hi Mike,
Hope you are doing great!
Planned Delivery Date is the date and time at which the goods are planned to be delivered at the receiver’s address, as specified on the purchase order line.
Promised Delivery Date is the date and time at which the supplier has agreed or confirmed to deliver to an agreed location.
Usually, the Promised Delivery Date is a Non editable field as given below.

If we need to change the promised date, we could use the menu option Confirm with Differences, in the order header.

And change the Promised delivery date as required.

Now you could see in the PO line the planned delivery date also has changed accordingly.

So you could update the Planned delivery date by Promised delivery date.
Please let me know if there's any concerns.

Many Thanks,
Anuki

records.BMCServiceDesk__description__c: Email Sent-Incident #00014684 -  Unable to bill preventive maintenance  (Ref:IN:00014684)
records.BMCServiceDesk__note__c:
From: incident@hoist.tech
Sent: Fri, Apr 19, 2024 12:04 PM
To: kanishka.undugodapathirana@hoist.tech;
Subject: Incident #00014684 -  Unable to bill preventive maintenance  (Ref:IN:00014684)

Hi Kanishka,
 Find the Technical investigations below,
 
 The Actual error is (ORA-06502: PL/SQL: numeric or value error: character string buffer too small) which means the 'Create Invoice' function is passing an ATTR with more characters and the initially declared
 Character size of the ATTR is less therefore leading to this error. This is a IFS standard functionality therefore this has to be reported to IFS for fix, i will be attaching the error and code Screenshots for reference.
    
 Code that belongs to this functionality 
 Best Regards,
 Keerthigan

Subject: Incident #00014711 -  Pallet Detail  (Ref:IN:00014711)

Hi Andrea,

Hope you are doing good.

Could you please provide feedback on the below-mentioned concerns before proceeding with the request?

1. Do we need to consider any particular status in the Shipment window to enable the new report? Or else, regardless of the Shipment status, the report should be generated?

2. In one particular Shipment. there can be multiple customer orders included. In such cases, how do we need to populate the data into the report? 

3. Does the report print through RMB on the Shipment Header only?

4. Assume in a particular shipment, we have two lines with the same part number, the same customer order. 
* Line 1 - Qty has been reserved (eg: 5 Qty)
* Line 2 - Qty has not been reserved (0 Qty)

As per the request, you need to sum up the Qty for the above scenario and is it correct to show Reserved Qty as 5 in one line? (Sum the Qty if the part number is equal in the same CO)

5. Except for the highlighted fields, all the other fields just need to be made available in the report, right?



Thanks,
Lakshika.

To: Andrea Hernandez <andrea.hernandez@acsind.com>
Subject: Incident #00014711 - Pallet Detail (Ref:IN:00014711)

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless recognized
Hi Andrea,

Hope you are doing good.

Could you please provide feedback on the below-mentioned concerns before proceeding with the request?

1. Do we need to consider any particular status in the Shipment window to enable the new report? Or else, regardless of the Shipment status, the report should be generated?[AH] Regardless of the shipment status, the report should be generated.

2. In one particular Shipment. there can be multiple customer orders included. In such cases, how do we need to populate the data into the report? [AH] This report should only work for shipments that only have 1 customer order, not multiple customer orders.

3. Does the report print through RMB on the Shipment Header only?[AH] Yes, RMB on the shipment header.

4. Assume in a particular shipment, we have two lines with the same part number, the same customer order.
* Line 1 - Qty has been reserved (eg: 5 Qty)
* Line 2 - Qty has not been reserved (0 Qty)

As per the request, you need to sum up the Qty for the above scenario and is it correct to show Reserved Qty as 5 in one line? (Sum the Qty if the part number is equal in the same CO)[AH] Yes, correct!

5. Except for the highlighted fields, all the other fields just need to be made available in the report, right?[AH] Correct, they are static data.

From: Incident(Hoist.tech) <incident@hoist.tech>

To: Andrea Hernandez <andrea.hernandez@acsind.com>
Subject: Incident #00014711 - Pallet Detail (Ref:IN:00014711)

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless recognized

Hi Andrea,

Hope you are doing good.

Could you please provide feedback on the below-mentioned concerns before proceeding with the request?

1. Do we need to consider any particular status in the Shipment window to enable the new report? Or else, regardless of the Shipment status, the report should be generated?[AH] Regardless of the shipment status, the report should be generated.

2. In one particular Shipment. there can be multiple customer orders included. In such cases, how do we need to populate the data into the report? [AH] This report should only work for shipments that only have 1 customer order, not multiple customer orders.

3. Does the report print through RMB on the Shipment Header only?[AH] Yes, RMB on the shipment header.

4. Assume in a particular shipment, we have two lines with the same part number, the same customer order. 
* Line 1 - Qty has been reserved (eg: 5 Qty)
* Line 2 - Qty has not been reserved (0 Qty)

As per the request, you need to sum up the Qty for the above scenario and is it correct to show Reserved Qty as 5 in one line? (Sum the Qty if the part number is equal in the same CO)[AH] Yes, correct!

5. Except for the highlighted fields, all the other fields just need to be made available in the report, right?[AH] Correct, they are static data.
 


Thanks,
Lakshika.

Hi hoist,
We have a qwerty
We would like to know if it is possible merge two list of values into one field.
I mean, in a custom field to have the option to select from two lists of values.
F
BMCServiceDesk__incidentDescription__c:
It is possible merge two list of values into one field?


Hi hoist,
We have a qwerty
We would like to know if it is possible merge two list of values into one field.
I mean, in a custom field to have the option to select from two lists of values.
For example, we have the NCR screen and 4 custom fields, one is the customer id, from which the customer id information is pulled and then we have another field that, according to the customer id, then reflects the name so it is the case for supplier id and the name of it.  (see screenshot)
So the question is, can it be simplified to just two fields? Example, if we can have a field called “customer ID/ Supplier id” and when selecting the list of values, we could have a list of values whit a tab to separate these two lists and the user selects either one or the other? (see screenshot) and in the same way the other custom field for the name description according to the ID selection.
